channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stock futures gain ahead of Thanksgiving week — and the crucial holiday shopping season
item.description: U.S. stock futures rose Sunday, in hopes of building on Friday’s rebound, as investors await the start of the critical holiday shopping season followi...

item.title: Here’s what bitcoin and U.S. Treasurys have in common right now
item.description: Charlie Garcia responds to readers concerned about weakening demand for both cryptocurrency and U.S. government debt.

item.title: ‘I’ve always lived hand-to-mouth’: I’m 64. My father left me $400K from his 457(b) plan. My brother is suing me. How can I defend myself?
item.description: “I live off my Social Security of $900 a month.”

item.title: Retailers try to downplay worries about lower-income shoppers, as bargains reign supreme
item.description: Earnings Watch: Burlington, Kohl’s, Best Buy and other chains report this week ahead of Black Friday as concerns about the economy linger.

item.title: ‘There’s a lot of tension’: My brother and I manage a $5 million trust. How do we solve our many disagreements?
item.description: “We have a good estate attorney, but he just repeats the facts; we need someone to help with the feelings.”

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 stocks for solid upside potential
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks favored by Wall Street, including Microsoft and Booking Holdings.

item.title: A U.S.-China trade truce means more localized technology. How to play it
item.description: As the U.S. and China settle into an uneasy one-year truce, the takeaway for investors is that each country will double-down on homegrown tech, analys...

item.title: Activist Ananym Capital sees upside if Baker Hughes spins off its oilfield services business
item.description: Ananym said it expects a potential separation could result in an about 51% immediate upside through realizing Baker's sum of parts valuation.

item.title: These are the most oversold stocks in the market that are ripe for a near-term bounce
item.description: We used the CNBC Pro stock screener to find stocks that have a 14-day relative strength index (RSI) below 30, leaving them technically oversold.

item.title: Does Berkshire's big tech bet signal a new risk tolerance in Omaha?
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway's purchase of Alphabet shares may signal a new acceptance of greater risk for greater reward.
